response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled performance. Given its unique features and quality, I believe it would be an invaluable addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14,995. I trust this opportunity will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product.", "product_price": 14995}
